short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dogfight 2 is a free World War 2 airplane fighting game where you control a heavy armed biplane.

long.ar,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_419,fa,:
Dogfight 2 - Play Online Free is available in the chrome web store just install it and play Dogfight 2 Game. 

Dogfight 2 is a free World War 2 airplane fighting game where you control a heavy armed biplane.

Grab the control yoke of a warplane and jump into the battlefields of World War 2 in this thrilling combat flight.

Note: There are more games available to play.

How To Use:-

1. Firstly Click on "Add To Chrome" Button.
2. After loading data you need to click on "Extension Icon".
3. You will redirect in Chrome Offline and play the game.
4. Lets Enjoy

Thanks  :)
